name: com.ryle-e.ryle-radio
description: A complete "radio" system for Unity with tuning, broadcasters, insulators, code-free interactions and events, procedural audio, AudioClips, dynamic modularity, and more! Fully documented with comprehensive samples and annotations.

samples.description: A simple scene to demonstate the basic functions of Ryle Radio
A scene to demonstrate spatial components in Ryle Radio, namely Broadcasters and Insulators
An intermediate scene showing coded and code-free interactions and events in a radio
